title: We are hiring a Remote Google Ads & Meta Ads Account Manager with strong expertise in digital advertising.
job_overview:
We are hiring a Remote Google Ads & Meta Ads Account Manager with strong expertise in digital advertising.
Send your CV: Upgrade to see actual info

Salary: $3000 - $5000/month depending on experience

Role:

Manage paid advertising on Google and Meta platforms.

Optimize campaigns for KPIs.

Work remotely, independently.

Requirements:

1+ year hands-on experience running ads.

KPI-driven, strong reporting skills.
